param.name: unitFeatureClass
param.dialogReference: The municipal boundary, Senate District, House District, Congressional District, or other feature that is intended to be accounting for in meeting attendence.

param.name: unitNameField
param.dialogReference: A field within the Unit Feature Class which is the name or label for the unit. Field will be used to determine the number of duplicates shown in the spreadsheet

param.name: meetingBufferFeatureClassFeatureClass
param.dialogReference: Feature class contains the buffered area for multiple meeting locations. Layer must be pre buffered.

param.name: meetingLocationNameField
param.dialogReference: Field within the meeting buffer which dictates what meeting location it is. Field is used to determine number of duplicates within the dataset.

param.name: csvPath
param.dialogReference: Path to the output speadsheet file. Must be a CSV file.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: System Information Group, Traffic Information Systems, SIR Division, Arkansas Department of Transportation.
